name: FOREST SPIRITS
description: Constant warfare takes place in all kinds of ecosystems, in forests and in rare and vast lands with wealth is no different. According to Japanese mythology, ancestral trees have life, and all their biodiversity and DNA are connected by roots that echo through hills and valleys, rivers and waterfalls. The spirits will react aggressively against anyone who disrespects the environment, and if someone,deforests, burns, cuts down a tree to be traded inhabited by an ancestral spirit unnecessarily, or, without paying him due honor, he will curse his community!
